titleStmt.title: The history of Antonio and Mellida. The first part. As it hath beene sundry times acted, by the children of Paules. Written by I.M.
Antonio and Mellida. Part 1
titleStmt.author: Marston, John, 1575?-1634.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Bradock] for Mathewe Lownes, and Thomas Fisher, and are to be soulde in Saint Dunstans Church-yarde,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The first part of Antonio and Mellida.
The second part was published as "Antonios revenge".
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
